name: Segovias - Maduro Robusto
additionalNotes: Segovias de Esteli is distinguished by its commitment to excellence in customer service and personalized attention. Their meticulous focus on quality control and care at every stage of the production of their cigars ensures that they exceed the expectations of their customers. Each product reflects our attention to detail, creating a harmonious experience that resonates with the dedication and passion they put into each cigar.
